title: Twitter user collects four amazing photos of Jill scolding Joe Biden, POTUS looking like he just got punished
description:
They say a picture is worth a thousand words. Here are four thousand words about an intimate moment between Dr. Jill Biden Ph.D. and her husband Joe. It is not the first time we've seen Jill treat her husband Joe like a child. Those instances have been in the public eye where they don't understand the words "hot mic" or "the camera's rolling." Here, the two were not aware of an Associated Press reporter catching them in the middle of what appears to be an argument.

The photos were collected by Twitter user Jake Schneider, who I'm guessing works for a small boutique firm in Minnesota called RNC Research.

A story in four parts: pic.twitter.com/Xdd1OfJQCT
— Jake Schneider (@jacobkschneider) July 6, 2022

One of them looks very familiar.

There it is.

Let's peruse each photo that this person shared on the public app called Twitter. They set a narrative.

Photo #1: We see what appears to be an angry Joe Biden holding a newspaper. He could be angry at his latest poll numbers. Or, maybe, he was angry at Jill for asking him if he remembered to use the bathroom before he left for a speech in Cleveland.

Photo #2: It appears it's Jill's turn to speak. "Don't give me that 'I don't have to go'. We tell you to go before you leave all the time. Plus, we can smell... did you just go now?"

Photo #3: He did.

Photo #4: Jill walks away in frustration because Joe is Karine Jean-Pierre's problem to clean up.

But this is just speculation on my part. Maybe Hunter sent Jill one of his "special" videos. Joe could have asked for help with the crossword puzzles, and Jill said she was busy. Maybe Joe was upset Jill forgot to make him a reservation at Michael Symon's restaurant while he was in The Land, and Jill had to remind him she's a doctor and not a secretary. It's anyone's guess.

Let us know in either the Facebook comments or Twitter responses. What story do you think these photos tell?

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: ACLU defends convicted child murderer, claims "she" didn't get the gender-affirming care she needed in prison
description:
Duane Owen was put to death in Florida yesterday. Convicted in 1984 of the rape and murder of a FOURTEEN-YEAR-OLD and the murder of a single mother, Owen was shuffled loose his mortal coil. But the real crime, according to the American Civil Liberties Union (ALCU) is that SHE (Duane) didn't get the gender-affirming care SHE needed in prison. And this murdering rapist was forced to live the last thirty years in prison in the wrong body.

I'm going to go with the screen capture of this tweet. We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website have the distinct feeling this will be deleted at some point today.

For context, this is who the ACLU is playing the she/her pronoun game with.



\u201cHE was a rapist and murderer. HE even raped and murdered a child. The world is better off without HIM.\u201d
— Christina Pushaw \ud83d\udc0a \ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8 (@Christina Pushaw \ud83d\udc0a \ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8) 1686963967

Not even CNN is willing to play make-believe on this one.

As CBS News reports, Duane (aka she/her) stabbed a 14-year-old girl EIGHTEEN TIMES. Then after murdering the girl, she/her raped the 14-year-old corpse. The second murder of the single mother came years later.

Duane's attorneys tried claiming gender dysphoria to get him an insanity plea and excuse the murders and the necrophiliac rape. But Florida psychiatrists said, "Nope, that's not going to work this time."

\u201cFor context: Owen raped and killed a a 14 year old girl and then another woman in a separate incident.\n\nOwen's defense claimed he had gender dysphoria to try to get him out of getting executed, but state psychiatrists disagreed with the diagnosis.\u201d
— AG (@AG) 1686967377

Accusing people of -isms and -phobias are great for social media engagement on the left. The ACLU needs to drive donations. There is a wealth of white suburban progressives who can't wait to send their money to causes so that their other white suburban progressive friends can revel in their virtue. But rule #1 of social media is to READ before you tweet.

\u201cthe interesting thing about this horrendously bad tweet is the amount of gay men and lesbians quote tweet/responding to it horrified over what this sort of negative activism is doing towards their cause.\u201d
— kaitlin (@kaitlin) 1687000500

I'm not saying the ACLU uses interns to manage their social media. I'm sure this was a professional, fresh out of college, low-information zoomer who gets paid to do the job. But maybe don't cape for murderers who rape corpses, regardless of how they identify after murdering and raping corpses.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: LA Dodgers honor anti-Catholic drag nuns in empty stadium as thousands of Catholics patriotically protest outside
description:
Last night, the Los Angeles Dodgers honored bigoted, anti-Catholic drag troupe the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence to literally tens of people in attendance. That's right. All the drama and the Dodgers wound up sneaking the bigoted queens onto the field when no one was looking. All while thousands of normie-Americans exercised their patriotic dissent outside.

I think we can call this a win. Or kinda a win.

To recap, the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence (who you may remember from such blog posts as this 2019 classic, "ANOTHER Child Sex Offender Discovered at 'Drag Queen Story Time'") are an anti-Catholic troupe of queens who dress up as nuns and mock the crucifixion of Christ. The Dodgers had uninvited them from Pride Night when it was brought to the team's attention that this is considered offensive to millions of people.

It needs to be said, no one complained about the Dodgers having a Pride night. It was just this one group of blasphemous queens. The elusive "common ground" we are told we need to find would have been to find honorees who aren't full of hatred towards a specific group of Americans. But after the "Sisters" were uninvited, leftist politicians got involved. The team was forced to bend the knee and invited them back with a full-throated apology. LGBTQ activist bullies demand you support their every kink, or else.

Los Angeles Catholics chose "or else."

\u201cBREAKING: Thousands of Catholics have shut down the main entrance to Dodger Stadium on Vin Scully avenue in protest of the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence being honored tonight. \n\nThey are now lining the sidewalks and have taken over the entire block:\u201d
— Savanah Hernandez (@Savanah Hernandez) 1686961758

The Dodgers, I guess as a compromise OR to make sure the queens weren't booed out of LA, gave them their award to an empty stadium. This was over an hour before the first pitch was thrown.

\u201cDODGER STADIUM-The \u201cSisters of Perpetual Indulgence\u201d are recognized for Pride night to a mostly empty audience. \n\nTwo Dodgers fan nearby begin loudly booing after they\u2019re announced:\u201d
— Savanah Hernandez (@Savanah Hernandez) 1686964733

Reporter Savanah Hernandez says that the Dodgers were still honoring various Ls, Gs, Ts, Is, +s, and whatnot between every inning. Yet the blasphemous drag queens -- this one troupe that was so crucial in showing Pride because you're a homophobe if you don't affirm every kink and every glory hole in June -- got snuck out on the field before most people showed up.

This is why I call this "kinda" a win. A win would have been if the Dodgers organization stood its ground against Pride bullies and kept the Sisters uninvited. But the fact that being invited was rendered so toxic the only way for the Dodgers to check the box was to honor them before anyone showed up for the ballgame is at least half a win. Maybe two-thirds of a win. It's a win-ish.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.
